name: The Iliad
description: An ancient Greek epic poem attributed to Homer, set during the Trojan War.

name: The Odyssey
description: An ancient Greek epic poem attributed to Homer, detailing the adventures of Odysseus as he returns home from the Trojan War.

name: The Aeneid
description: An epic Latin poem by Virgil that tells the legendary story of Aeneas, a Trojan who traveled to Italy and became the ancestor of the Romans.
